"A.P.241/3/22/11:00": "On A.P.238/2/20, you were enlisted, as ARKS, to complete a mission on planet Naberius."
"As you completed numerous missions, you quickly gained recognition within ARKS, and many adventures unfolded before you."
"Darkers, Dark Falz... And the main leader, the [Profound Darkness]. The whole fight has been a success!"
"The [Profound Darkness] was sealed against all odds due to you and [Persona] never giving up."
"Because of that, the girl you safeguarded, Matoi, was freed from the [Profound Darkness]!"
"However as a sacrifice, [Persona] became the new host of the [Profound Darkness], which brings us to the present..."
"Looking back now, it's still amazing. At the moment, that person is right in front of me! Ah, forgive me. I went off topic."
"At the moment, it's been 2 years since the resurrection of the [Profound Darkness]."
"I don't blame you for being surprised, <%me>. For you, it all went by in an instant!"
"After your fight with the [Profound Darkness], you entered Cold Sleep in order to cleanse you of Darker Factor."
"During that time, we were still fighting the [Profound Darkness]. But don't worry! Both ARKS and the universe have survived!"
"And now, <%me>'s grand return! ARKS are ready to go at last!"
"I know that you just finished your purification, but I woke you up because I have a favor to ask of you."
"Oh, before we get to that, how about you go on a quick quest or have a wander around the ship? Just as a way to stretch your legs!"
"You've been out of action for two years. There's probably a lot of people who were waiting for you."
